definition: (football) a kick from the center of the field to start a football game or to resume it after a score
details:
noun
- (football) a kick from the center of the field to start a football game or to resume it after a score
- a start given to contestants
= example: a start given to contestants
= synonyms: send-off, start-off
- the time at which something is supposed to begin
= synonyms: beginning
